text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Murmur, murmur...

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: I really wanted McQueen to win<n>today...

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
I've been camping on this spot for a<n>whole week just to
see her get her<n>third win with my own eyes.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Rice...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eheheh... They're all disappointed.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I heard there was a sight you wanted<n>me to see, but all I
see is a repeat of<n>the Kikuka Sho...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I mean, I knew this would happen,<n>but... still, it... it hurts.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
...When I was disqualified in the<n>autumn Tenno Sho, I felt
much the<n>same way.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Knowing I'd betrayed the hopes of so<n>many, I found it
difficult to carry on.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But then, I saw it—the sight I speak of.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The sight...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm sure you'll see it too. Come on,<n>now. We're up.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? ...Ah!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Murmur, murmur...

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Look, it's Rice Shower! Why'd you<n>have to deny her third
win, huh?!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: We came here to see McQueen win!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Dammit, we gotta drown them out!<n>Good going, Rice! You're
the best!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Congratulations, Rice!

text_block_list.name: Fan C
text_block_list.text: You... you ran well.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ayy! You get it! Now gimme one more,<n>in a voice she can
hear this time!

text_block_list.name: Fan C
text_block_list.text: Huh?! O-okay! You ran well!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: There are people cheering... forme.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And this is the sight only a victor can<n>see.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Those who placed their hopes in you,<n>those who had their
hopes dashed...<n>Standing here, you can see all their<n>faces.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
To take all those emotions in—the<n>good and the bad—is the
duty of a<n>victor, and also her pride.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: A victor's duty... and pride...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
For the fans who put even the<n>slightest of hopes in you...
And for the<n>fans who hoped against you... For all<n>their
sakes, stand tall.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Now, time to show them what a true<n>victor looks like.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Okay!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
All the people disappointed that I<n>won—they'll be even more<n>
disappointed if I don't look like I<n>belong up here.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I need to stand tall—look them all in<n>the eye, and show them
that I'll keep<n>on running...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Until one day, I become anUmamusume they'll be happy tosee win!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I have high hopes for you, Rice.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The concert begins, marking not only<n>Rice's victory but also
McQueen's<n>crushing defeat.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And yet, Rice sings with far more<n>spirit than she did after the
Kikuka<n>Sho.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: McQueen, you did well out there.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ...Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
It seems like Rice has noticed what<n>she's been lacking this
entire time.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I could tell from her singing.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I could tell from her singing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Gosh, what a disgrace for me though.<n>I was the one who
asked you to enter<n>her in the race, and here I am<n>
defeated.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: She really did... perform wonderfully.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's not exaggerating. Rice ran<n>better than I've ever seen
her run.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But the same goes for McQueen. I<n>could feel how much she
wanted her<n>third title.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I was just one step away... I wanted<n>to win!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Sob. Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She ran with a lot on her shoulders<n>today. The weight of her
ambition. Her<n>duties as team ace. And I have<n>nothing but
gratitude for her efforts.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower must see that too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The witch had nobody to turn to. But<n>one day, a boy came to
visit her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: "I want to soar across the sky like a<n>bird."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The witch gladly cast a spell on the<n>boy, and he smiled, for
his wish had<n>come true. "Wow! This is incredible!"

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: After seeing that, the others started to<n>visit the witch too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Some were still scared, but day by<n>day, more and more
people began to<n>smile.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The witch wanted to make everyone<n>happy, so she cast
spell after spell,<n>sparing none of her power.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But one day, she suddenly became<n>unable to use magic.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Using so much had tired her out, and<n>she collapsed from
exhaustion.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Everyone who had once feared the<n>witch then realized how
hard she had<n>worked to make them happy.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Now that they knew her true feelings,<n>they began to care for
her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
They all eagerly awaited the day she<n>would become healthy
enough to use<n>magic again.
